segments.text: Do you speak a foreign language ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I am capable of speaking English smoothly . I have been learning English for years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How well do you know English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no trouble communicating with native English Speaker . I even taught spoken English in a training school .
segments.speaker: S2
